item.title: Just this thing
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

Okay i decied my logo is a space ship. So here it is. Plz feedback

[code]
//made by: Katikens edited by me a little
//Official Site: http://robbycoding.smfforfree2.com
program robbeelogo;
type TDirection = (dirLeft, dirRight);

var
Buffer: Integer;
Okey, Okey: Integer;
f: Integer;
Direction: TDirection;
x: Integer;
begin
DisplayDebugImgWindow(300, 300);

Okey := BitmapFromString(80, 80, ‘z78DAED9A4992C4300804BFE4’ +
‘57F8FF4F9AEB44CC44B7160A4129EBE04BB736524280FDBE08217’ +
‘F3DBF84355CC94219BE58831539D9A1AF4D72D6F24C2A9FC8B324’ +
‘8F1DABB6FFDA28677BEB42B98EFD674789EA533DCFBE7C75F6CFE’ +
‘97FF686EA485947218AD7DAFFCFEEAB8E11632FBEEA18A30BE57C’ +
‘AB46C5F06A7F5E27FBC8E11B757E73FC64E6E9AB4C39FFFECDF19’ +
‘0995CE0ABCE35A2DAEE1071E51B3B0A35DE5EF52B6AD7D5E60629’ +
‘DED1204E0A4208218410F2CE53C8E8EF240B65579A50BE8D2CDCB’ +
‘D09C2BA2347EEEBBE0489BABDBDEBD9B540D6C307C2D7DBCBE1B7’ +
‘6BAE9718BB636ED24B70843264A10CDFEFD68D79F6E07EDA4ADD9’ +
‘F6EB9FC7F7C7B715F9BEDE756E3BF7639C59FDBD4E132626745AB’ +
‘15CAF53C730E5FB585CFF3AD1459294E568E8515FEB96F4CE5716’ +
‘F568FAC72F912DF3AE4C25E7968BF4C9ECA065529284316D6BD28’ +
‘F05D071C11420821DDED8C356E88BB2AEF8D7B76E3FE4A77F8EAA’ +
‘268EF2C38D3B6D5F8FAE5656B73F6E3EB9A772BF88EF796C37767’ +
‘26DD29CFCE39BF1235BE8B46DACEAE6BC756F5F99EAD18E7B48DD’ +
‘A0950AEC937D68375BC8B6FE6BBE3CFEFA19C3FD6A9BDE7515F9A’ +
‘B5A722DF54FC7ADB3B4AF5AD141B574745D7F0DD39E9519522CE6’ +
‘F35BEF56333F8EE54B73CF8DE105FD5CCB6D473F0C88F74EF6715’ +
‘5CF657715BFEABA8D2C4D2A9B352D7CCF7B5D39D5FDBF28D31420’ +
‘82184D05FFD0045D6AC5D’);

Okey:= CreateMirroredBitmap(Okey);

Buffer:= BitmapFromString(300, 300, ‘’);

SetTransparentColor(Okey, clWhite);
SetTransparentColor(Okey, clWhite);

x:= 0;
repeat
FastDrawClear(Buffer, clGreen);

for f:= 0 to 50 do
begin
  FastDrawTransparent(Random(380) - 80, Random(380) - 65, Okey, Buffer);
  FastDrawTransparent(Random(380) - 80, Random(380) - 65, Okey, Buffer);
end;

if(Direction = dirRight)then
  FastDrawSizeTransparent(x, 50, x + 200, 250, Okey, Buffer)
else
  FastDrawSizeTransparent(x, 50, x + 200, 250, Okey, Buffer);

//move big bulldozer
if(Direction = dirRight)then
  x:= x + 1;
if(Direction = dirLeft)then
  x:= x - 1;
//change direction if needed
if(x <= 0)then
  Direction:= dirRight;
if(x >= 100)then
  Direction:= dirLeft;

//display the result
SafeDrawBitmap(Buffer, GetDebugCanvas, 0, 0);

until(False);
end.
[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: April 25, 2007, 07:39:57 PM[/size][hr]No replys to the best thing i think I’ve ever created?
